```{r rmdpartialsetup,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE}
if (exists("testing")) {
  data("ChickWeight")
  regression <- lm(weight ~ Time, data = ChickWeight)
}
```


```{r}
knitr::kable(coef(regression))
```

Values vs. fitted values.

```{r}
pars <- par(ask = FALSE)
plot(regression$model[,1], fitted(regression))
```
